name: Kill Them
description:
A small clicker Game about killing spider-things to earn money to purchase upgrades!

  • The knife icon in the bottom-left will open the Shop
  • The Ticket Icon in the bottom-right will Increase your Level ($50)
  • The Gear Icon in the top-right will open the Options Menu
  • Important you are able to keep buying and stacking the same top-row of items however, you don't need to buy the the bottom-row Items after the first purchase

This is a small project I have been working on over the few months and now I'm finally ready to release the first official version of this game! This game may have some features that are not working/functioning.
